title: Jobotrak
description:
JoboTrak helps you track job applications and interviews, and optimize your job hunting strategy using AI.

🌟 The Origin Story
Ever felt overwhelmed managing dozens of job applications? That's exactly what happened to our founder, during the tech layoffs of 2023. After keeping track of 100+ applications in spreadsheets and losing track of follow-ups, he knew there had to be a better way.

In today's job market, Simply applying to jobs isn't enough. JoboTrak help you land your dream job faster.
